text: Tirunellai Narayana Iyer Seshan (15 December 1932 – 10 November 2019) was an Indian bureucrat. He was the 18th Cabinet Secretary of India in 1989. He was appointed the 10th Chief Election Commissioner of India (1990–96) and became known for election reforms. He won the Ramon Magsaysay Award for government service in 1996. He died at his home in Chennai on 10 November 2019 of cardiac arrest, aged 86. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Tamil Nadu politicians
title: T. N. Seshan
